title: Oluwole Fasakin - Application Architect & Data Engineering Lead
description: Updates, projects, and insights from Oluwole Fasakin - Elite Application Architect & Data Engineering Lead with 9+ years experience delivering data-driven products and scalable engineering systems.

items.title: Portfolio Update: New Brands & Client Work Added
items.content_html: Excited to announce major updates to my portfolio showcasing work with IBM, Smooth Apply AI, LSTG, PHC CivcX, T.Valton, and EPC. Also featuring new client work for La Necar Logistics LLC.
items.summary: Portfolio updated with new brand partnerships and client work including IBM, Smooth Apply AI, and logistics solutions.

items.title: WitsLens: EdTech Platform Launch
items.content_html: Led the digital growth and operational strategy for WitsLens, an innovative e-learning platform. Focused on enhancing scalability, member experience, and analytics visibility.
items.summary: WitsLens EdTech platform - exploring learning through a clear lens.

items.title: TechCurious: Innovation Hub Launch
items.content_html: Directed end-to-end digital strategy for TechCurious, an innovation community managing budgets and leading cross-functional teams to boost brand engagement and educational outcomes.
items.summary: TechCurious - answering your spoken and unspoken technology curiosity.

items.title: COVID-19 and Cholera Co-infection Research Publication
items.content_html: Published research on COVID-19 and cholera co-infection and comorbidity in Africa and Asia: a systematic review and meta-analysis. Journal of Global Health Economics and Policy, 2024.
items.summary: Peer-reviewed research publication on health interactions.

items.title: One Health Approach for Rabies Prevention in Nigeria
items.content_html: Contributed to research on holistic application of the One Health approach in the prevention and control of rabies in Nigeria. One Health Outlook, 2024.
items.summary: Research contribution on rabies prevention using One Health approach.
